name: Party Monster: Games in Company
description:
Did you get bored of endless Alias, Forfeits and Crocodile games during the party? Then Party Monster is what you need. It is an original collection of games with friends on the Android platform. The collection includes games on the alcoholic, active, intellectual and even vulgar themes. Some games are firstly released on Google Play and will fit at any party.
Most Likely is a playful alcoholic game that allows you to find out who are you for your friends.
In The Death Circle, you should perform funny, unusual and sometimes a naughty task and compete with friends.
In The Improvisation, you show hilarious situations without pronouncing a word.
The Cowboy beer pong is a new version of student amusement with the exclusive kinds of throws in and simple rules.
Ding-Ding, admit that you never did answer tricky questions, and have fun.
Yes or No is a classic intellectual game including a good number of new tasks.
